src_raw AS (
  SELECT
    CAST(id AS INT) AS id,
    name, address, industry_sector, npwp_comp, nib, province, city,
    district, postal_code, company_size, website, company_social_media,
    CAST(customer_rate AS DECIMAL(3,1)) AS customer_rate
  FROM myDataSource
),
src_cnt AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS c FROM src_raw),
gate AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN s.c = 0 THEN 0
           WHEN s.c < cfg.min_rows THEN 0         -- tahan jika terlalu sedikit
           ELSE 1
         END AS ok
  FROM src_cnt s CROSS JOIN cfg
)
SELECT
  id, name, address, industry_sector, npwp_comp, nib, province, city,
  district, postal_code, company_size, website, company_social_media, customer_rate
FROM src_raw
CROSS JOIN gate
WHERE ok = 1;"}},"node-1755500875431":{"ApplyMapping":{"Inputs":["node-1755500692663"],"Mapping":[{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["id"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"id","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["name"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"name","ToType":"string"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["pk_address"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_address","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["address"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"address","ToType":"varchar"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["pk_postal"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_postal","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["postal_code"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"postal_code","ToType":"varchar"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["company_size"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"company_size","ToType":"varchar"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["pk_size"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_size","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["pk_prov"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_prov","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["prov_id"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"prov_id","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["pk_city"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_city","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["city_id"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"city_id","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["pk_prov_utama"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_prov_utama","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["province"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"province","ToType":"varchar"},{"Dropped":true,"FromPath":["pk_city_utama"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_city_utama","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["city"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"city","ToType":"varchar"}],"Name":"Change postal","Paths":[["id"],["kode_pos"]]}},"node-1755587268101":{"SparkSQL":{"Inputs":["node-1755500875431"],"Name":"Clean with hash","OutputSchemas":[{"Columns":[{"Name":"id","Type":"int"},{"Name":"name","Type":"string"},{"Name":"address","Type":"string"},{"Name":"industry_sector","Type":"string"},{"Name":"npwp_comp","Type":"string"},{"Name":"nib","Type":"string"},{"Name":"province","Type":"string"},{"Name":"city","Type":"string"},{"Name":"district","Type":"string"},{"Name":"postal_code","Type":"string"},{"Name":"company_size","Type":"string"},{"Name":"website","Type":"string"},{"Name":"company_social_media","Type":"string"},{"Name":"customer_rate","Type":"decimal(10,2)"},{"Name":"row_hash","Type":"string"}]}],"SqlAliases":[{"Alias":"myDataSource","From":"node-1755500875431"}],"SqlQuery":"WITH src AS (
  SELECT id, name, address, postal_code, company_size, province, city
  FROM myDataSource
),

/* 1) NORMALISASI DASAR */
norm AS (
  SELECT
    id,

    -- Nama: trim, minimal 3 char, max 150
    CASE 
      WHEN name IS NULL OR length(trim(name)) < 3 THEN NULL 
      ELSE substring(trim(name), 1, 150) 
    END AS name,

    -- Alamat: trim untuk validasi panjang
    trim(address) AS address,

    -- Placeholder kolom bisnis (belum ada di source)
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS industry_sector,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS npwp_comp_norm,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS nib_norm,

    -- Wilayah
    substring(initcap(trim(coalesce(province, ''))), 1, 50)  AS province,
    substring(initcap(trim(coalesce(city, ''))),     1, 100) AS city,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS district,

    -- Kode pos: simpan digit saja dulu
    regexp_replace(coalesce(CAST(postal_code AS STRING), ''), '[^0-9]', '') AS postal_code_digits,

    -- Normalisasi company_size berbasis lower()
    CASE lower(coalesce(company_size,'')) 
      WHEN 's'      THEN 'small'
      WHEN 'small'  THEN 'small'
      WHEN 'm'      THEN 'medium'
      WHEN 'medium' THEN 'medium'
      WHEN 'l'      THEN 'large'
      WHEN 'large'  THEN 'large'
      ELSE 'unknown'
    END AS company_size,

    -- Placeholder lain
    CAST(NULL AS STRING)       AS website_norm,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING)       AS company_social_media,
    CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(3,1)) AS customer_rate_num
  FROM src
),

/* 2) CANONICALIZATION TAMBAHAN */
norm2 AS (
  SELECT
    n.*,
    -- Kode pos final: wajib 5 digit, selain itu NULL
    CASE 
      WHEN length(n.postal_code_digits) = 5 THEN n.postal_code_digits
      ELSE NULL
    END AS postal_code_norm
  FROM norm n
),

/* 3) SKORING DUPLIKAT ID */
scored1 AS (
  SELECT
    n2.*,
    COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY id) AS id_dupe_cnt
  FROM norm2 n2
),

/* 4) ATURAN DATA QUALITY (paralel semangat versi personal) */
scored AS (
  SELECT
    s1.*,
    CASE
      WHEN id IS NULL THEN 'BAD_ID_NULL'
      WHEN name IS NULL THEN 'BAD_NAME'
      WHEN length(address) > 255 THEN 'BAD_ADDRESS_LEN'
      WHEN id_dupe_cnt > 1 THEN 'BAD_DUP_ID'
      -- Jika ada digit kode pos tapi bukan 5 digit, tandai bad
      WHEN postal_code_digits IS NOT NULL AND postal_code_digits <> '' AND length(postal_code_digits) <> 5 THEN 'BAD_POSTAL_LEN'
      ELSE 'OK'
    END AS dq_flag
  FROM scored1 s1
)

/* 5) OUTPUT AKHIR + ROW_HASH UNTUK JEJAK PERUBAHAN */
SELECT
  id,
  NULLIF(trim(name), '')                 AS name,
  NULLIF(trim(address), '')              AS address,
  NULLIF(trim(industry_sector), '')      AS industry_sector,
  NULLIF(trim(npwp_comp_norm), '')       AS npwp_comp,
  NULLIF(trim(nib_norm), '')             AS nib,
  NULLIF(trim(province), '')             AS province,
  NULLIF(trim(city), '')                 AS city,
  NULLIF(trim(district), '')             AS district,
  NULLIF(trim(postal_code_norm), '')     AS postal_code,
  NULLIF(trim(company_size), '')         AS company_size,
  NULLIF(trim(website_norm), '')         AS website,
  NULLIF(trim(company_social_media), '') AS company_social_media,
  CAST(customer_rate_num AS DECIMAL(3,1)) AS customer_rate,

  -- Paritas dengan personal: jejak perubahan
  md5(concat_ws('||',
      CAST(id AS STRING),
      coalesce(trim(name), ''),
      coalesce(trim(address), ''),
      coalesce(trim(industry_sector), ''),
      coalesce(trim(npwp_comp_norm), ''),
      coalesce(trim(nib_norm), ''),
      coalesce(trim(province), ''),
      coalesce(trim(city), ''),
      coalesce(trim(district), ''),
      coalesce(trim(NULLIF(trim(postal_code_norm), '')), ''),
      coalesce(trim(company_size), ''),
      coalesce(trim(website_norm), ''),
      coalesce(trim(company_social_media), ''),
      coalesce(CAST(customer_rate_num AS STRING), '')
  )) AS row_hash
FROM scored
WHERE dq_flag = 'OK';"}},"node-1755499001717":{"ApplyMapping":{"Inputs":["node-1755498972391"],"Mapping":[{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["id"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_prov","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["prov_id"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"prov_id","ToType":"int"}],"Name":"Change prov"}},"node-1755500508841":{"ApplyMapping":{"Inputs":["node-1755500493385"],"Mapping":[{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["id"],"FromType":"int","ToKey":"pk_prov_utama","ToType":"int"},{"Dropped":false,"FromPath":["name"],"FromType":"string","ToKey":"province","ToType":"string"}],"Name":"Change      WHEN company_size IS NULL OR trim(company_size) = '' THEN NULL     WHEN regexp_like(company_size, '^[0-9]+$')           THEN cast(company_size AS VARCHAR(50))     WHEN regexp_like(company_size, '^[<>~]?[0-9]+(-[0-9]+)?$')           THEN trim(company_size)     ELSE NULL company_size"}},"node-1755660402121":{"CustomCode":{"ClassName":"MyTransform","Code":"from awsglue.dynamicframe import DynamicFrame, DynamicFrameCollection
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

# Step 1: Ambil source data dari DynamicFrameCollection
frame = dfc.select(list(dfc.keys())[0])
source_df = frame.toDF()

# Step 2: Koneksi ke MySQL
jdbc_url = "jdbc:mysql://mdm.cbu4ew0qm5gk.ap-southeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/mdm"
dbtable = "company"
mysql_user = "admin"
mysql_pass = "Queencard123"

connection_options = {
    "url": jdbc_url,
    "driver": "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver",
    "dbtable": dbtable,
    "user": mysql_user,
    "password": mysql_pass
}

spark = glueContext.spark_session

# Step 3: Ambil ID yang sudah ada di tabel target
target_df = spark.read \
    .format("jdbc") \
    .option("url", jdbc_url) \
    .option("dbtable", dbtable) \
    .option("user", mysql_user) \
    .option("password", mysql_pass) \
    .load()

target_ids = target_df.select("id").rdd.flatMap(lambda x: x).collect()

# Step 4: Pisahkan data baru dan data update (tidak pakai kolom tambahan)
new_df = source_df.filter(~col("id").isin(target_ids))
updated_df = source_df.filter(col("id").isin(target_ids))

# Step 5: Gabungkan final dataframe
final_df = new_df.unionByName(updated_df)

# Step 6: Hapus record lama dari MySQL (overwrite per id)
if updated_df.count() > 0:
    id_list = [str(row["id"]) for row in updated_df.select("id").collect()]
    id_string = ",".join(id_list)

    try:
        spark._sc._jvm.java.lang.Class.forName("com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver")
        conn = spark._sc._jvm.java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(jdbc_url, mysql_user, mysql_pass)
        stmt = conn.createStatement()
        delete_sql = f"DELETE FROM {dbtable} WHERE id IN ({id_string})"
        stmt.execute(delete_sql)
        stmt.close()
        conn.close()
    except Exception as e:
        print("‚ùå Error saat DELETE via JDBC:", e)
        raise e

# Step 7: Simpan final_df ke MySQL
if not final_df.rdd.isEmpty():
    final_df.write \
        .format("jdbc") \
        .options(**connection_options) \
        .mode("append") \
        .save()

# Step 8: Kembalikan sebagai DynamicFrameCollection
output_dyf = DynamicFrame.fromDF(final_df, glueContext, "output")
return DynamicFrameCollection({"output": output_dyf}, glueContext)    ","Inputs":["node-1755589930026"],"Name":"CDC","OutputSchemas":[{"Columns":[{"Name":"id","Type":"int"},{"Name":"name","Type":"string"},{"Name":"address","Type":"string"},{"Name":"industry_sector","Type":"string"},{"Name":"npwp_comp","Type":"string"},{"Name":"nib","Type":"string"},{"Name":"province","Type":"string"},{"Name":"city","Type":"string"},{"Name":"district","Type":"string"},{"Name":"postal_code","Type":"string"},{"Name":"company_size","Type":"string"},{"Name":"website","Type":"string"},{"Name":"company_social_media","Type":"string"},{"Name":"customer_rate","Type":"decimal(10,2)"}]}]}},"node-1755500239135":{"Join":{"Columns":[{"From":"node-1755498592199","Keys":[["id"]]},{"From":"node-1755499215094","Keys":[["pk_address"]]}],"Inputs":["node-1755498592199","node-1755499215094"],"JoinType":"left","Name":"Join
